Package simpleGUI

Class MultiLineTextBox

java.lang.Object
simpleGUI.MultiLineTextBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
TextDisplay
public class MultiLineTextBox extends Object implements TextDisplay
A multi line text box.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MultiLineTextBox(Frame owner, boolean addScrollbar)
    Create a multi line text box with a scrollbar (if true), attached to a chosen frame.
    MultiLineTextBox(Frame owner, String text)
    Create a multi line text box with a chosen text, attached to a chosen frame.
    MultiLineTextBox(Frame owner, String text, boolean addScrollbar)
    Create a multi line text box with a chosen text, a scrollbar (if true), attached to a chosen frame.
    MultiLineTextBox(Frame owner, String text, boolean addScrollbar, String textBoxBorderTitle)
    Create a multi line text box with a chosen text, a scrollbar (if true), a border title, attached to a chosen frame.

  • Constructor Details

    • MultiLineTextBox

      public MultiLineTextBox(Frame owner, boolean addScrollbar)
      Create a multi line text box with a scrollbar (if true), attached to a chosen frame.
      Parameters:
      owner - Frame
      addScrollbar - If true add a vertical (always visible) and horizontal (if needed).

    • MultiLineTextBox

      public MultiLineTextBox(Frame owner, String text)
      Create a multi line text box with a chosen text, attached to a chosen frame.
      Parameters:
      owner - Frame
      text - The text content.

    • MultiLineTextBox

      public MultiLineTextBox(Frame owner, String text, boolean addScrollbar)
      Create a multi line text box with a chosen text, a scrollbar (if true), attached to a chosen frame.
      Parameters:
      owner - Frame
      text - The text content.
      addScrollbar - If true add a vertical (always visible) and horizontal (if needed).

    • MultiLineTextBox

      public MultiLineTextBox(Frame owner, String text, boolean addScrollbar, String textBoxBorderTitle)
      Create a multi line text box with a chosen text, a scrollbar (if true), a border title, attached to a chosen frame.
      Parameters:
      owner - Frame
      text - The text content.
      addScrollbar - If true add a vertical (always visible) and horizontal (if needed).
      textBoxBorderTitle - The title of the border.

      public void setSize(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Set the size of the multi line text box
      Specified by:
      setSize in interface TextDisplay
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate for top left corner.
      y - Y-coordinate for top left corner.
      width - The width of the multi line text box.
      height - The height of the multi line text box.

    • getTextContent

      Get the text content of the multi line text box.

      The text content.
      Throws:
